question:
You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.


You and your family are living in rented accommodation in an English speaking country. You are not satisfied with the condition of some of the furniture.


Write a letter to your landlord. In your letter


introduce yourself


explain what is wrong with the furniture


say what action you would like the landlord to take


You do NOT need to write any addresses.


Begin your letter as follows:


Dear .................,


You should write at least 150 words.
text: Hi, I am your new tenant who recently moved in with my parents. we are not quite satisfied with the condition of the furniture as they are not as good as shown in the photo.

First, when we entered the dining room, I noticed that there are some holes on both sides of the coach which seemed to have been scratched by an animal previously. Secondly, the bed in the master room is missing one leg and I am afraid it would not be safe to sleep.  After we toured the whole house, we found that the main gate handle is broken and unable to be locked.
We are disappointed about the whole house and my parents were upset about it.  I am wondering if it would be possible for you to refund the deposit and rent that has been paid to you.
I hope you understand that it is not easy for a family just to move to a different city. Please let me know whether you could do the refund. Thanks!
